001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.storage;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.parameters.Late;
004import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
005import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
006import java.lang.reflect.Type;
007import java.util.ArrayList;
008import java.util.Collections;
009import java.util.HashMap;
010import java.util.LinkedList;
011import java.util.List;
012import java.util.Map;
013import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
014import org.springframework.core.ParameterizedTypeReference;
015
016import static io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.config.FrameworkConfigHolder.getFrameworkConfig;
017
018/**
019 * Manages temporary storage of test data within a single test execution.
020 *
021 * <p>This class provides a thread-safe mechanism for storing, retrieving, and organizing test data
022 * using enum keys. Data can be stored at multiple levels, including a hierarchical sub-storage,
023 * enabling structured data management during test execution.
024 *
025 * <p>The storage supports retrieval of data by key, by index, or by type, and it also supports
026 * deferred data creation through the {@code Late} interface. Additionally, it offers methods
027 * for extracting all matching values based on type.
028 *
029 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
030 */
031public class Storage {
032
033   private final Map<Enum<?>, LinkedList<Object>> data = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
034   private static Enum<?> defaultStorageEnum;
035
036   /**
037    * Stores a value under the specified key.
038    *
039    * @param key   The enum key identifying the data.
040    * @param value The data value to store.
041    * @param <T>   The type of the data.
042    */
043   public <T> void put(Enum<?> key, T value) {
044      data.computeIfAbsent(key, k -> new LinkedList<>()).add(value);
045   }
046
047   /**
048    * Retrieves the latest stored value associated with the given key.
049    *
050    * @param key   The enum key identifying the data.
051    * @param clazz The expected class of the data.
052    * @param <T>   The type of the data.
053    * @return The most recent value of type {@code T}, or {@code null} if not found.
054    */
055   public <T> T get(Enum<?> key, Class<T> clazz) {
056      return getLatestValue(key, clazz, null);
057   }
058
059   /**
060    * Retrieves the latest stored value using a type reference.
061    *
062    * @param key           The enum key identifying the data.
063    * @param typeReference The parameterized type reference for the data.
064    * @param <T>           The type of the data.
065    * @return The most recent value of type {@code T}, or {@code null} if not found.
066    */
067   public <T> T get(Enum<?> key, ParameterizedTypeReference<T> typeReference) {
068      return getLatestValue(key, null, typeReference);
069   }
070
071   /**
072    * Retrieves a stored value by index using a {@code DataExtractor} and casts it to the expected type.
073    *
074    * @param extractor The data extractor defining how to extract the value.
075    * @param clazz     The expected class of the extracted data.
076    * @param index     The index (1-based) of the value to retrieve.
077    * @param <T>       The type of the data.
078    * @return The extracted value of type {@code T}.
079    */
080   public <T> T get(DataExtractor<T> extractor, Class<T> clazz, int index) {
081      Object result = (extractor.getSubKey() != null)
082            ? sub(extractor.getSubKey()).getByIndex(extractor.getKey(), index, Object.class)
083            : getByIndex(extractor.getKey(), index, Object.class);
084
085      return clazz.cast(extractor.extract(result));
086   }
087
088   /**
089    * Retrieves a stored value using a {@code DataExtractor} without specifying an index.
090    *
091    * @param extractor The data extractor defining how to extract the value.
092    * @param clazz     The expected class of the extracted data.
093    * @param <T>       The type of the data.
094    * @return The extracted value of type {@code T}.
095    */
096   public <T> T get(DataExtractor<T> extractor, Class<T> clazz) {
097      Object result = (extractor.getSubKey() != null)
098            ? sub(extractor.getSubKey()).get(extractor.getKey(), Object.class)
099            : get(extractor.getKey(), Object.class);
100
101      return clazz.cast(extractor.extract(result));
102   }
103
104   /**
105    * Retrieves a value by its index from the stored data for the specified key.
106    *
107    * @param key   The enum key identifying the data.
108    * @param index The index (1-based) to retrieve.
109    * @param clazz The expected class of the value.
110    * @param <T>   The type of the value.
111    * @return The value at the specified index, or {@code null} if not found.
112    */
113   public <T> T getByIndex(Enum<?> key, int index, Class<T> clazz) {
114      return getValueByIndex(key, index, clazz, null);
115   }
116
117   /**
118    * Retrieves a value by its index using a type reference.
119    *
120    * @param key           The enum key identifying the data.
121    * @param index         The index (1-based) to retrieve.
122    * @param typeReference The parameterized type reference for the value.
123    * @param <T>           The type of the value.
124    * @return The value at the specified index, or {@code null} if not found.
125    */
126   public <T> T getByIndex(Enum<?> key, int index, ParameterizedTypeReference<T> typeReference) {
127      return getValueByIndex(key, index, null, typeReference);
128   }
129
130   /**
131    * Retrieves the latest stored value by filtering based on class.
132    *
133    * @param key   The enum key identifying the data.
134    * @param clazz The expected class of the value.
135    * @param <T>   The type of the value.
136    * @return The most recent value of type {@code T}, or {@code null} if not found.
137    */
138   public <T> T getByClass(Enum<?> key, Class<T> clazz) {
139      return findByClass(key, clazz, null);
140   }
141
142   /**
143    * Retrieves the latest stored value by filtering based on a type reference.
144    *
145    * @param key           The enum key identifying the data.
146    * @param typeReference The parameterized type reference for the value.
147    * @param <T>           The type of the value.
148    * @return The most recent value of type {@code T}, or {@code null} if not found.
149    */
150   public <T> T getByClass(Enum<?> key, ParameterizedTypeReference<T> typeReference) {
151      return findByClass(key, null, typeReference);
152   }
153
154   /**
155    * Retrieves all stored values that match the specified class.
156    *
157    * @param key   The enum key identifying the data.
158    * @param clazz The expected class of the values.
159    * @param <T>   The type of the values.
160    * @return A list of all values of type {@code T} associated with the key.
161    */
162   public <T> List<T> getAllByClass(Enum<?> key, Class<T> clazz) {
163      return findAllByClass(key, clazz, null);
164   }
165
166   /**
167    * Retrieves all stored values that match the specified type reference.
168    *
169    * @param key           The enum key identifying the data.
170    * @param typeReference The parameterized type reference for the values.
171    * @param <T>           The type of the values.
172    * @return A list of all values of type {@code T} associated with the key.
173    */
174   public <T> List<T> getAllByClass(Enum<?> key, ParameterizedTypeReference<T> typeReference) {
175      return findAllByClass(key, null, typeReference);
176   }
177
178   /**
179    * Retrieves a sub-storage instance associated with the given sub-key.
180    *
181    * <p>If no sub-storage exists for the given key, a new sub-storage is created and registered.
182    *
183    * @param subKey The enum key for the sub-storage.
184    * @return The {@code Storage} instance corresponding to the sub-key.
185    * @throws IllegalStateException if the key is already used for a non-storage value.
186    */
187   @SuppressFBWarnings(
188         value = "ST_WRITE_TO_STATIC_FROM_INSTANCE_METHOD",
189         justification = "This write is intentional for initializing defaultStorageEnum under controlled conditions."
190   )
191   @SuppressWarnings("java:S2696")
192   public Storage sub(Enum<?> subKey) {
193
194      List<Object> values = data.get(subKey);
195      if (values == null || values.isEmpty()) {
196         if (defaultStorageEnum == null) {
197            String defaultStorage = getFrameworkConfig().defaultStorage();
198            if (subKey.name().equals(defaultStorage)) {
199               defaultStorageEnum = subKey;
200            }
201         }
202         Storage newSub = new Storage();
203         data.put(subKey, new LinkedList<>(Collections.singletonList(newSub)));
204         return newSub;
205      }
206
207      Object existingLatest = values.get(values.size() - 1);
208      if (existingLatest instanceof Storage result) {
209         return result;
210      }
211
212      throw new IllegalStateException(
213            "Key " + subKey + " is already used for a non-storage value: " + existingLatest);
214   }
215
216   /**
217    * Retrieves the default sub-storage.
218    *
219    * @return The default {@code Storage} instance.
220    * @throws IllegalStateException if no default storage is initialized.
221    */
222   public Storage sub() {
223      if (defaultStorageEnum == null) {
224         throw new IllegalStateException("There is no default storage initialized");
225      }
226      return sub(defaultStorageEnum);
227   }
228
229   /**
230    * Resolves any stored deferred values (instances of {@link Late}) by replacing them
231    * with their actual evaluated objects.
232    */
233   public void createLateArguments() {
234      data.replaceAll((key, objects) -> {
235         LinkedList<Object> updatedObjects = new LinkedList<>();
236         for (Object o : objects) {
237            if (o instanceof Late<?>) {
238               try {
239                  updatedObjects.add(((Late<?>) o).create());
240               } catch (Exception ignored) {
241                  //ignore failure
242               }
243            } else {
244               updatedObjects.add(o);
245            }
246         }
247         return updatedObjects;
248      });
249   }
250
251   /**
252    * Retrieves a value stored by a hook (e.g., DbHook or ApiHook) from the global storage map.
253    *
254    * <p>Looks up the HOOKS map under {@link StorageKeysTest#HOOKS} and returns the entry
255    * associated with the given key object, cast to the specified type.</p>
256    *
257    * @param value the hook key under which data was stored
258    * @param clazz the expected class of the stored value
259    * @param <T>   the type of the returned object
260    * @return the hook-stored value cast to {@code T}, or {@code null} if not present
261    */
262   public <T> T getHookData(Object value, Class<T> clazz) {
263      Map<Object, Object> values = get(StorageKeysTest.HOOKS, Map.class);
264      if (values == null || values.get(value) == null) {
265         return null;
266      }
267      return clazz.cast(values.get(value));
268   }
269
270   /**
271    * Returns a deep copy of all raw storage entries.
272    *
273    * <p>This method creates and returns a new map where each enum key is
274    * mapped to a fresh list containing the same elements as the internal storage.
275    * Modifications to the returned map or its lists will not affect the original storage.</p>
276    *
277    * @return a snapshot of the entire storage contents
278    */
279   @SuppressWarnings("java:S1452")
280   public Map<Enum<?>, List<Object>> getData() {
281      Map<Enum<?>, List<Object>> copy = new HashMap<>();
282      for (Map.Entry<Enum<?>, LinkedList<Object>> entry : data.entrySet()) {
283         copy.put(entry.getKey(), new ArrayList<>(entry.getValue()));
284      }
285      return copy;
286   }
287
288   /**
289    * Attempts to cast the provided value to the specified class, returning null if the cast is not possible.
290    *
291    * @param value The value to be cast.
292    * @param clazz The target class for casting.
293    * @param <T>   The type to cast to.
294    * @return The cast value of type {@code T}, or {@code null} if the value is not an instance of {@code clazz}.
295    */
296   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
297   private <T> T castOrNull(Object value, Class<T> clazz) {
298      return (clazz.isInstance(value)) ? (T) value : null;
299   }
300
301   /**
302    * Attempts to cast the provided value to the specified type reference, returning null if the cast is not possible.
303    *
304    * @param value         The value to be cast.
305    * @param typeReference The target parameterized type for casting.
306    * @param <T>           The type to cast to.
307    * @return The cast value of type {@code T}, or {@code null} if the value is not compatible.
308    */
309   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
310   private <T> T castOrNullTypeRef(Object value, ParameterizedTypeReference<T> typeReference) {
311      if (value == null) {
312         return null;
313      }
314
315      Type type = typeReference.getType();
316      Class<?> rawType;
317
318      if (type instanceof ParameterizedType parameterizedType) {
319         Type rawTypeFromParam = parameterizedType.getRawType();
320         if (rawTypeFromParam instanceof Class<?>) {
321            rawType = (Class<?>) rawTypeFromParam;
322         } else {
323            return null;
324         }
325      } else if (type instanceof Class<?>) {
326         rawType = (Class<?>) type;
327      } else {
328         return null;
329      }
330
331      return rawType.isInstance(value) ? (T) value : null;
332   }
333
334   /**
335    * Retrieves the latest value stored under the given key.
336    *
337    * @param key           The enum key identifying the data.
338    * @param clazz         The expected class of the value, or {@code null} if using a type reference.
339    * @param typeReference The parameterized type reference for the value, or {@code null} if using a class.
340    * @param <T>           The type of the value.
341    * @return The latest stored value cast to type {@code T}, or {@code null} if no value exists.
342    */
343   private <T> T getLatestValue(Enum<?> key, Class<T> clazz, ParameterizedTypeReference<T> typeReference) {
344      List<Object> values = data.get(key);
345      if (values == null || values.isEmpty()) {
346         return null;
347      }
348      Object latest = values.get(values.size() - 1);
349      return clazz != null ? castOrNull(latest, clazz) : castOrNullTypeRef(latest, typeReference);
350   }
351
352   /**
353    * Retrieves a stored value by its index.
354    *
355    * @param key           The enum key identifying the data.
356    * @param index         The 1-based index of the value to retrieve.
357    * @param clazz         The expected class of the value, or {@code null} if using a type reference.
358    * @param typeReference The parameterized type reference for the value, or {@code null} if using a class.
359    * @param <T>           The type of the value.
360    * @return The value at the specified index, or {@code null} if the index is invalid.
361    */
362   private <T> T getValueByIndex(Enum<?> key, int index, Class<T> clazz, ParameterizedTypeReference<T> typeReference) {
363      List<Object> values = data.get(key);
364      if (values == null || index < 1 || index > values.size()) {
365         return null;
366      }
367      Object value = values.get(values.size() - index);
368      return clazz != null ? castOrNull(value, clazz) : castOrNullTypeRef(value, typeReference);
369   }
370
371   /**
372    * Finds the latest stored value that matches the specified class.
373    *
374    * @param key           The enum key identifying the data.
375    * @param clazz         The expected class of the value, or {@code null} if using a type reference.
376    * @param typeReference The parameterized type reference for the value, or {@code null} if using a class.
377    * @param <T>           The type of the value.
378    * @return The latest matching value, or {@code null} if none found.
379    */
380   private <T> T findByClass(Enum<?> key, Class<T> clazz, ParameterizedTypeReference<T> typeReference) {
381      List<Object> values = data.get(key);
382      if (values == null) {
383         return null;
384      }
385      for (int i = values.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
386         Object value = values.get(i);
387         T casted = clazz != null ? castOrNull(value, clazz) : castOrNullTypeRef(value, typeReference);
388         if (casted != null) {
389            return casted;
390         }
391      }
392      return null;
393   }
394
395   /**
396    * Retrieves all stored values that match the specified class.
397    *
398    * @param key           The enum key identifying the data.
399    * @param clazz         The expected class of the values, or {@code null} if using a type reference.
400    * @param typeReference The parameterized type reference for the values, or {@code null} if using a class.
401    * @param <T>           The type of the values.
402    * @return A list of all matching values, or an empty list if none found.
403    */
404   private <T> List<T> findAllByClass(Enum<?> key, Class<T> clazz, ParameterizedTypeReference<T> typeReference) {
405      List<Object> values = data.get(key);
406      List<T> result = new ArrayList<>();
407      if (values != null) {
408         for (Object value : values) {
409            T casted = clazz != null ? castOrNull(value, clazz) : castOrNullTypeRef(value, typeReference);
410            if (casted != null) {
411               result.add(casted);
412            }
413         }
414      }
415      return result;
416   }
417
418}
